title: Gotta love Boards
body: I ask why Conqueror is considered strong, and instead of an explanation about adaptive force and dueling power, I get insulted about using it on the "wrong champ" and trolled into thinking that Phase Rush and Nimbus Cloak - two of the worst runes in the game, I can now confirm - were better choices for Morde. Le trolol. Good job, people. Being such a positive force for honest players. I cannot figure out why Rioters have all but abandoned the place.
